10 10 60 
 This  menu function calls a next level menu which allows 
one to set:
 1. a structure function for the first incoming particle;
 2. a structure function for the second incoming particle; 
 3. momentum of the first particle; 
 4. momentum of the second particle. 

  There is a possibility  to display plot for the selected 
structure functions (the F7 key).
